😊 **Market Events** 

- Monad Mainnet is set to launch on November 24th at 9am ET. [Monad (mainnet arc)](https://twitter.com/1342961741718810632/status/1986087005386842568)

- Harmonic launches an open block building system to enhance Solana's speed, fairness, and competitiveness. [Harmonic](https://twitter.com/1973854931388878848/status/1986087228150366367)

- Namik shares a list of MegaETH sale participants representing 9.5% of addresses and 25% of USD allocation, emphasizing transparency and core community involvement. [namik // mega-chef Σ:](https://twitter.com/2804432229/status/1986055902131315056)

🔥 **Top Mindshare Gainers** 

**[PIPWORLD]** +81bps - PIPWORLD has gained significant attention today due to its leaderboard launch on KaitoAI, introducing the world's first AI-driven trading ecosystem. Users can create, train, and deploy PiP World agent swarms across any DEX and chain. The project is being compared to an AI hedge fund playground, with a leaderboard now live to track user engagement. The involvement of influential figures like Saad Naja, a former Kraken executive, adds credibility. The platform's potential to revolutionize AI-driven trading is being closely watched, with many expressing interest in its innovative approach. [ref0](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986042106235027857) [ref1](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986041587499995591) [ref2](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986043685243400295) [ref3](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986058832662159854) [ref4](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986054037784150452)

**[MEMEMAX]** +68bps - Today's discussions around MEMEMAX focus on its integration with Kaito and the ongoing MaxPack event, which offers rewards for on-chain transactions. Users are actively engaging in transactions to earn higher-value packs, with some reporting significant rewards. The community is also discussing the potential of MEMEMAX's platform and its future developments, including its onboarding process and fee structures. The excitement is driven by the potential for high returns and the strategic partnerships MEMEMAX is forming. [ref0](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986055907500040596) [ref1](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986088858736566475) [ref2](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986000892529987902) [ref3](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986040810035646779) [ref4](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986244683056750760) [ref5](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986025468244656412) [ref6](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986256856130748908) [ref7](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986225787452989836)

**[MEGAETH]** +45bps - Today's discussions around MEGAETH primarily focused on the public allocation strategy and the transparency of the process. The MegaETH team has been praised for their detailed explanation of the allocation methodology, which includes a scoring system based on on-chain activity, social engagement, and MegaETH-specific signals. The community expressed mixed emotions, with some celebrating their inclusion on the core community list, while others expressed disappointment at being left out. The discussions also touched on the potential of MegaETH as a leading platform for crypto applications, with some users expressing strong belief in its future success. [ref0](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986059469470445964) [ref1](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986076104990593170) [ref2](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986067662749704489) [ref3](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986067426593710137) [ref4](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986105394796941666)

**[MONAD]** +41bps - The main discussions for MONAD today revolve around the upcoming launch of the Monad Mainnet and its associated airdrop, scheduled for November 24th. This has generated significant excitement and anticipation within the cryptocurrency community, with several tweets highlighting the mainnet launch, airdrop details, and the support from various platforms and wallets. Additionally, there is a focus on the strategic partnerships and ecosystem development surrounding Monad, as well as comparisons to other blockchain projects. [ref0](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986087005386842568) [ref1](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986086013089812545) [ref2](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986085683635581157) [ref3](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986094362653303133) [ref4](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986121042956550144) [ref5](https://twitter.com/i/status/1985952470485418458) [ref6](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986132233586155776) [ref7](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986103223149842723) [ref8](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986089914493030448) [ref9](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986095443571261713)

**[INTUITION]** +36bps - INTUITION, represented by the ticker $TRUST, has gained significant attention today due to its mainnet launch and subsequent listings on major exchanges like Binance, KuCoin, and Kraken. The project, which focuses on decentralizing information and turning data into assets, has seen a positive reception with its airdrop and staking opportunities. The community is actively engaging with the project, celebrating its potential to revolutionize the knowledge economy through decentralized trust and reputation systems. [ref0](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986053923539464613) [ref1](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986018783459201144) [ref2](https://twitter.com/i/status/1985997481671536824) [ref3](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986047097976533167) [ref4](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986154397609455676) [ref5](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986072169953263623) [ref6](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986057474567188834) [ref7](https://twitter.com/i/status/1986032031050981851)

😊 **Market Events** 

- President Trump announces a $2000 dividend payment for Americans, excluding high-income earners. [Watcher.Guru](https://twitter.com/1387497871751196672/status/1987497495749124448)

🔥 **Top Mindshare Gainers** 

**[XMR]** +54bps - Today's discussions around XMR (Monero) are centered on its privacy features and its comparison with Zcash (ZEC). Many tweets highlight Monero's decentralized nature and its superior privacy technology, which hides wallet addresses, as opposed to Zcash's focus on hiding transaction amounts. The Monero community is also addressing controversies involving character attacks on a Zcash developer, emphasizing that these do not represent the broader Monero community. Additionally, there is excitement about Monero's potential integration with Thorchain, which would enhance its liquidity and adoption. The privacy coin's recent price movements and potential for further gains are also a topic of interest. [ref0](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987571863136981459) [ref1](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987420324560822766) [ref2](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987526856837374094) [ref3](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987631352158593104) [ref4](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987485001362071857) [ref5](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987588510296035731) [ref6](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987545167826485352)

**[STBL]** +34bps - The main discussion for STBL today revolves around the introduction of Stablecoin 2.0 by @stbl_official. This concept shifts the role of stablecoin issuers from centralized companies to the users themselves, allowing users to mint USST by depositing RWAS into STBL. The mechanism of USST is supported by STBL's revenue-sharing structure, enabling users to engage in DeFi activities while earning interest from revenue-generating stablecoins. This marks a significant evolution from Stablecoin 1.0 to STBL's Stablecoin 2.0. [ref0](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987511227631730845)

**[LTC]** +32bps - LTC has gained significant attention today due to predictions of a major price surge, with some speculating it could reach $500, $700, or even $6,000. Many tweets highlight a potential reversal against BTC and a possible large cap rotation signal, indicating an altcoin season. The sentiment is largely bullish, with discussions on LTC's potential to outperform Bitcoin and its increasing institutional adoption. The community is also excited about LTC's historical stability and its potential for a breakout. [ref0](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987471370192843145) [ref1](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987469639144595837) [ref2](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987518050275557661) [ref3](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987590656135438513) [ref4](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987475952335527949) [ref5](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987529742342320164) [ref6](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987704917855785354)

**[PEPE]** +25bps - Today's discussions around PEPE focus on its potential as a top-performing memecoin, with comparisons to DOGE and SHIB. Analysts caution against unrealistic expectations, suggesting that reaching a $10B market cap is a reasonable upper limit. The Rare Pepe collection on OpenSea and the Pepe Dollar presale, which has raised $4M, are also highlighted. Additionally, the community's strong holding behavior is noted as a factor in PEPE's market dynamics. [ref0](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987646560503554450) [ref1](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987503199675424769) [ref2](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987495648435044555) [ref3](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987651029811265575) [ref4](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987669280712802477)

**[DOGDOG]** +24bps - DOGDOG has gained significant attention today due to its association with Bitcoin and its potential as a meme coin. The discussions highlight the progress of ZapApp, a project aimed at simplifying Bitcoin and meme coin transactions, which is nearing completion. The community is also speculating about the potential launch of a new platform by DOGDOG's creator, which could impact the meme coin market. Additionally, there is a playful engagement with the community asking if they would 'swipe right' on DOGDOG, further boosting its visibility. [ref0](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987413007178342510) [ref1](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987736416042754204) [ref2](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987698254931456054)

😊 **Market Events** 

- Hayden Adams proposes a significant update to Uniswap governance, introducing protocol fees, UNI burning, and new growth strategies to enhance Uniswap's role as a global decentralized exchange. [Hayden Adams 🦄](https://twitter.com/702654540387127296/status/1987990314997739625)

- Monad announces the MON public sale, the first token sale on Coinbase, starting November 17th and accessible in over 80 countries, including the U.S. [Monad (mainnet arc)](https://twitter.com/1342961741718810632/status/1987884526970843633)

- Coinbase introduces improved token launches with early access, prioritization of real supporters, sustainable distribution, and inclusion of US users, starting with the Monad sale on November 17. [Coinbase 🛡](https://twitter.com/574032254/status/1987883986924843073)

- The Bank of England is imposing a limit of £20,000 on stablecoin holdings. [Watcher.Guru](https://twitter.com/1387497871751196672/status/1987818797286502780)

🔥 **Top Mindshare Gainers** 

**[MONAD]** +192bps - Today's discussions around MONAD focus on its upcoming public sale on Coinbase's new token sales platform, marking the first ICO on the platform. The sale, set to start on November 17, will offer 7.5% of the token supply at a $2.5 billion FDV. While some are excited about the opportunity for broader participation, others criticize the tokenomics, highlighting concerns over the high allocation to the team and investors. The sentiment is mixed, with some expressing bullishness due to the potential for mass adoption and others wary of the perceived predatory nature of the token distribution. [ref0](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987883986924843073) [ref1](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987875673482911907) [ref2](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987886012492665006) [ref3](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987889793779331319) [ref4](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987890375760212295) [ref5](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987932683029115152) [ref6](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987915709016420863) [ref7](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987898509081686201) [ref8](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987920188801728632) [ref9](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987923931404398640)

**[COINBASE]** +183bps - Coinbase has gained significant attention today due to the announcement of its new token sales platform, which will allow retail investors to participate in token sales for the first time since 2018. The platform's first token sale will feature Monad (MON), accessible in over 80 countries, including the U.S. This move is seen as a major step in democratizing access to token sales and has sparked discussions about the potential impact on the crypto market. Additionally, Coinbase's initiative to prioritize genuine supporters over whales and insiders in token distributions has been well-received. [ref0](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987884526970843633) [ref1](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987883986924843073) [ref2](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987875673482911907) [ref3](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987889793779331319) [ref4](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987884634789556488) [ref5](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987892530789204251) [ref6](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987875442297037185) [ref7](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987876416122429864) [ref8](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987875537256358119) [ref9](https://twitter.com/i/status/1987875470843486242)

**[UNI]** +113bps - Today's discussions around UNI are centered on a new governance proposal by Uniswap Labs and the Uniswap Foundation, which aims to activate protocol fees and burn UNI tokens. The proposal includes burning 100M UNI from the treasury, introducing Protocol Fee Discount Auctions, and shifting focus to protocol growth. This move is seen as a significant step towards aligning incentives and enhancing the value of UNI, with many expressing excitement about the potential impact on the DeFi ecosystem. However, some concerns were raised about the impact on liquidity providers and the potential for increased competition. **[MEGAETH]** +84bps - The main discussions around MEGAETH today revolve around the controversy of the project enforcing its token lockup terms. A participant, icobeast, had their allocation revoked after publicly discussing plans to hedge their position, which violated the agreement. This action has sparked debates on the fairness and implications of such enforcement, with some viewing it as a positive sign of the project's commitment to its terms, while others see it as a potential stifling of open discourse. The incident has generated significant attention and mixed sentiments, contributing to MEGAETH's top mindshare gain. - Perpetual DEX platform Lighter has raised $68 million at a $1.5 billion valuation, according to Fortune. [zoomer](https://twitter.com/1391538435261861894/status/1988230604974850347)

- Injective has launched its EVM Mainnet, offering real-time transaction speeds and a MultiVM network for onchain finance. [Injective 🥷](https://twitter.com/1062118922147659776/status/1988260541253505429)

- Caleb Shack announces his new role as an Investment Partner at Variant Fund. [Caleb Shack](https://twitter.com/1427830847655268354/status/1988268144822022169)

**[ALLORA]** +105bps - ALLORA has gained significant attention today due to its listing on major exchanges like Binance, OKX, Kraken, and others. The project is being recognized for its innovative approach in combining AI with decentralized finance, aiming to create a predictive AI network. The community is actively discussing its potential impact on the AI and crypto markets, with many expressing optimism about its future. The listing has also been accompanied by airdrops and incentives, further fueling interest and engagement. **[BINANCE]** +51bps - Today's discussions around Binance highlight its significant presence in the crypto market, with mentions of its demo trading launch, a trading competition on BNB Smart Chain, and its role in the Allora (ALLO) listing. Binance's reserves remain strong, and its influence is evident in various DeFi and AI projects. The platform's strategic moves, including partnerships and innovations, continue to bolster its reputation as a leading crypto exchange. **[WALLCHAIN]** +37bps - WALLCHAIN has gained significant attention today due to the successful minting of its Quack Heads NFT collection, which sold out rapidly, with some stages lasting only seconds. The NFT mint, priced at 2.5 SOL, has seen its floor price rise to 16 SOL, indicating strong demand and potential profitability for early adopters. Discussions also highlight the evolving InfoFi platform, with changes to algorithms and potential token allocations to NFT holders. The community is actively engaging with the project, expressing excitement and anticipation for future developments. **[KINDRED]** +30bps - KINDRED has gained significant attention today due to its involvement in various discussions around its AI capabilities and NFT offerings. The tweets highlight the trending nature of Kindred AI, its collaboration with MemeCore, and the bullish sentiment around its NFT, particularly the Klara NFT, which has seen a substantial price increase. The discussions also touch on the potential of Kindred AI in transforming digital economies and its integration with other platforms like Sei Network. The excitement is further fueled by upcoming events such as the Kindred x MemeCore AMA, which is expected to address key questions about their collaboration. 😊 **Market events** 

- Seismic raised an additional $10 million in funding led by a16zcrypto. [Lyron](https://twitter.com/1432227198770073601/status/1988615844969038300)

- Coinbase announces its decision to leave Delaware and reincorporate in Texas, prioritizing the best interests of customers, employees, and shareholders. [paulgrewal.eth](https://twitter.com/2956378446/status/1988600592428871856)

🔥 **Top Mindshare Gainers** 

**[HYPERLIQUID]** +50bps - HYPERLIQUID has been a focal point in discussions today due to a significant incident involving a $3M withdrawal from OKX, which was spread across 19 wallets and used to long POPCAT, resulting in a $4.9M loss for HLP after a rapid liquidation. This event has led to Hyperliquid pausing its bridge for maintenance. Additionally, the launch of NVDA-PERP on Hyperliquid, the first permissionless perpetual swap on single name equities in crypto, has been highlighted as a major development. The platform's innovative features and strategic partnerships, such as with Polymarket for prediction markets, have also been discussed, showcasing its growing influence in the crypto space. [ref0](https://twitter.com/i/status/1988643538490323155) [ref1](https://twitter.com/i/status/1988700745995284547) [ref2](https://twitter.com/i/status/1988616068781187073) [ref3](https://twitter.com/i/status/1988642769737498809) [ref4](https://twitter.com/i/status/1988703570997440978)

**[POPCAT]** +43bps - POPCAT experienced significant volatility today due to a deliberate market manipulation on Hyperliquid. An individual withdrew $3M USDC from OKX, distributed it across 19 wallets, and opened $20-$30M long positions on POPCAT, creating a fake buy wall at $0.21. When the wall was removed, the price crashed, leading to $63M in total liquidations and a $4.9M loss for Hyperliquid's HLP. This incident, linked to previous manipulations, caused Hyperliquid to temporarily pause its Arbitrum bridge, sparking widespread discussion about market manipulation and the risks of high leverage on decentralized exchanges. **[POL]** +30bps - Today's discussions around POL primarily focus on the integration of Polygon by Calastone, the world's largest funds network, to launch tokenized fund share classes for 4,500 financial institutions across 58 markets. This move highlights Polygon's role in facilitating institutional finance onchain, offering faster settlement, lower costs, and enhanced transparency. Additionally, there is significant attention on Polygon's growing influence in Latin America, its role in stablecoin adoption, and its increasing transaction fees, indicating heightened network activity. **[ORD]** +24bps - The main discussions for ORD today revolve around the launch of the ZapApp, a self-custodial crypto app powered by Solana, which allows users to trade without KYC and gas fees. The app's launch has generated significant excitement, with a giveaway of $DOG tokens to celebrate. The app aims to simplify crypto trading and challenge the traditional exchange model by not charging listing fees. This has sparked discussions about the fairness of exchange listings and the potential for ZapApp to disrupt the market. - Polymarket becomes the official exclusive prediction market for the UFC and TKO. [Polymarket](https://twitter.com/1261335549215989760/status/1988966638595502205)

🔥 **Top Mindshare Gainers** 

**[POLYMARKET]** +56bps - Polymarket has gained significant attention today due to its exclusive partnership with the UFC, making it the official prediction market for the organization. This partnership will integrate Polymarket's prediction markets into live UFC events, providing real-time data visualization and fan sentiment momentum. Additionally, Polymarket's collaboration with Yahoo Finance to introduce a new prediction markets hub has further amplified its visibility. The discussions also highlight Polymarket's potential to revolutionize prediction markets by expanding into various sectors, including sports, politics, and finance. [ref0](https://twitter.com/i/status/1988966638595502205) [ref1](https://twitter.com/i/status/1989005876611461429) [ref2](https://twitter.com/i/status/1988955077961564566) [ref3](https://twitter.com/i/status/1988955629541593142) [ref4](https://twitter.com/i/status/1988875425167106170)

**[ZKPASS]** +50bps - Today's discussions around ZKPASS focus on the launch of its leaderboard on Kaito, highlighting its innovative zkTLS-based oracle network that allows users to generate cryptographic proofs from private web data without exposing personal information. The project has gained significant attention due to its potential to revolutionize internet trust and privacy, with many users expressing excitement about its future applications and recent successful sales. The community is particularly interested in its ability to verify facts securely and its upcoming TGE in December. [ref0](https://twitter.com/i/status/1988941628329914610) [ref1](https://twitter.com/i/status/1988952463760847036) [ref2](https://twitter.com/i/status/1988985728781676887) [ref3](https://twitter.com/i/status/1988942326291726565) [ref4](https://twitter.com/i/status/1988990553690894806) [ref5](https://twitter.com/i/status/1988985538125398325) [ref6](https://twitter.com/i/status/1989181257885090249)

**[AZTEC]** +50bps - Today's discussions around AZTEC primarily focus on the launch of its token sale, which is being conducted through an innovative onchain, community-driven model called the Continuous Clearing Auction (CCA) in collaboration with Uniswap. This model aims to ensure fair access, real-time price discovery, and transparency, with no hidden allocations or airdrops. The sale marks a significant transition for Aztec from a research project to a decentralized privacy network. The community-driven approach and the emphasis on privacy and decentralization have been widely praised, although some concerns about the lack of airdrops and the high floor price have been raised.
